pages.title: Nuclear Power
pages.text: Warium's nuclear reactors are endgame power generation solutions. Multiple reactor types support various fuel densities and output levels. Always handle with careâ€”improper setup leads to catastrophic failure.

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.text: Start with the standard reactor (lowest tier). Fuel rods provide burn time. Always ensure cooling is active. Breeder reactors create new fuel from spent material. Never skip shutdown sequences.

pages.title: Safety First
pages.text: $(bold)Golden Rule:$() Always check coolant flow before inserting fuel. Lack of cooling = reactor meltdown = bad day. Use containment blocks around your reactor. Keep a fire extinguisher nearby.
